primarySegments.name: Aspiring Entrepreneurs
primarySegments.description: Individuals looking to start their own businesses and need validation for their business ideas.

problemsNeeds: Need to validate business ideas before investing heavily
Require data on market trends and competition
Lack resources to conduct thorough market research
behaviors: Frequently search for business advice online
Use online tools for business planning

primarySegments.name: Small Business Consultants
primarySegments.description: Professionals who provide consulting services to small businesses and startups.

demographics: Advanced degrees in business or related fields
psychographics: Interested in business growth and strategy
problemsNeeds: Need reliable tools to offer data-driven advice
Require quick access to market analysis
Seek to enhance service offerings with technology

primarySegments.name: Corporate Innovation Teams
primarySegments.description: Teams within large corporations tasked with exploring new business opportunities and innovations.

demographics: Corporate professionals with business or technical backgrounds
psychographics: Value innovation and staying ahead of trends
problemsNeeds: Need to validate new business ideas quickly
Require comprehensive market data to support decisions
Seek tools that integrate with existing corporate systems

excludedSegments.name: Casual Hobbyists
excludedSegments.reason: This segment lacks the commitment to invest in a professional tool for business idea validation, as they engage in business activities more as a hobby than a serious venture.
